1.rationale:
From my current position at (9, 8), I have several options. Going left will take me away from the nearest apple at (2, 8) and closer to the enemy snake at (3, 7), which I don't want. Going up or down will result in a collision with the boundary of the board, which I definitely don't want.

So, going right seems the best option right now, even though it initially appears to take me farther from the nearest apple. But if I go right, it would keep every option open to change direction to any side in the next move.

However, an important note is, going right will put me at the edge of the board. So the next turn, I will need to either move Down or Left to avoid colliding with the board edge.

Next move: RIGHT
